channel.title: Tony Evans' Sermons on Oneplace.com
channel.description: The Urban Alternative is the national ministry of Dr. Tony Evans and is dedicated to restoring hope and transforming lives through the proclamation and application of the Word of God.
channel.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans
channel.itunes:summary: The Urban Alternative is the national ministry of Dr. Tony Evans and is dedicated to restoring hope and transforming lives through the proclamation and application of the Word of God.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Urban Alternative is the national ministry of Dr. Tony Evans and is dedicated to restoring hope and transforming lives through the proclamation and application of the Word of God.

item.title: The Symptoms of Deceptive Speech
item.description:
A lot is said about the importance of honesty, but a lot of what’s said isn’t all that honestand that’s not just true in political campaigns. Join Dr. Tony Evans as he talks about the danger in the lies we’re told and the lies we tellpart of his powerful series, Watch Your Mouth.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: Symptoms of Unholy Speech
item.description:
Dr. Tony Evans says that, whether they realize it or not, people who talk others down are just trying to talk themselves up. But in this lesson, he’ll explain why that’s the opposite of what happens as he tells us how to recognize symptoms of what the Bible calls unholy speech.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: Lord Over Your Lips, Part 2
item.description:
Imagine how much conflict we could avoid if everything we said came from a godly mind instead of our misguided emotions. Well, in this lesson, Dr. Tony Evans will explain why that goal is within your reach, and reveal how to make it a reality.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: Lord Over Your Lips, Part 1
item.description:
Tony Evans talks about how easily we can wind up speaking outside God’s will even while using God’s name. It’s a lesson about letting Jesus be the Lord of our lips as well as the Lord of our lives.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: Victory in Your Voice, Part 2
item.description:
Some people express their emotions more physically than othersboth at home and at church. But in this lesson, Dr. Tony Evans explains that while different styles of expression are fine, there’s a problem if God can’t hear the victory in your voice.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: Judgment in Your Jaws, Part 2
item.description:
Superheroes aren’t the only ones who need to be warned to use their powers "for good, not evil." In this lesson, Dr. Tony Evans says there's plenty of power in the words we choose and explains how to put that power to good use.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: Victory in Your Voice, Part 1
item.description:
Some people just seem to be able to talk their way out of any situation. But Dr. Tony Evans is here to explain how God can give the words we speak that same kind of power. It’s a look at how your circumstances can change when there’s victory in your voice.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: God in Your Gums, Part 2
item.description:
If the Lord is so willing to give us direction, why do we often feel so lost? And if he’s giving us words to say, why don't we speak up? Dr. Tony Evans will have the answers in this lesson as he talks about the importance of letting the Holy Spirit speak and live through us.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: God in Your Gums, Part 1
item.description:
The Bible teaches that faith gives us the power to move mountains. But in this lesson, Dr. Tony Evans explains that "moving mountains" means more than just rearranging some real estate. Discover the power of the words that come out of us after God’s truth goes into us.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: Power in Your Palate, Part 2
item.description:
The Bible teaches that faith gives us the power to move mountains. But in this lesson, Dr. Tony Evans explains that "moving mountains" means more than just rearranging some real estate. Discover the power of the words that come out of us after God’s truth goes into us.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: Power in Your Palate, Part 1
item.description:
Sometimes it feels like no matter what we say, nothing changes as though our lips are moving but nothing’s coming out. Join Dr. Tony Evans as he describes how different things can be when our words are backed up by God’s power.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: Dynamite in Your Dentures, Part 2
item.description:
Dr. Tony Evans says that sometimes, being tongue-tied is the best thing that could happen to you when you consider the potentially destructive power of the things we say. Find out why he says there’s dynamite in your dentures when you join him in this lesson.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: Judgment in Your Jaws, Part 2
item.description:
Superheroes aren’t the only ones who need to be warned to use their powers "for good, not evil." In this lesson, Dr. Tony Evans says there's plenty of power in the words we choose and explains how to put that power to good use.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans

item.title: Judgment in Your Jaws, Part 1
item.description:
Our words can sometimes do incredible damage, but in this lesson, Dr. Tony Evans says that the problem isn’t just what’s coming out of our mouths, but what’s going on in our hearts. Discover the real reason why we often say things that get us into trouble.
To support this ministry financially, visit: https://www.oneplace.com/donate/222/29
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tony Evans
